name: db-postgres-manage
description: - Install docker e docker-compose (https://docs.docker.com/desktop/setup/install/windows-install/) - Install dependences with :      ```bash      npm install      ``` ## Criar Container - Execute o seguinte comando para construir e iniciar o contêiner:      ```bash      docker-compose up --build      ``` ## Acessando Serviço - (localhost:3000)
